outputs.output_descr: The overall objective of this initiative is an enhanced capacity of the Ministry of Justice (MoJ) to elaborate the new medium term National Anti-Corruption Strategy by availing the UNDP's international experience in the field and its capacity of "neutral broker" in engaging all stakeholders in the policy development processes. This is a follow-up action of the last two AC strategies' implementation assessment developed with UNDP assistance. Considering the in-house expertise on anti-corruption within the MoJ and other public institutions concerned, and attempting to encourage national ownership of the strategy elaboration process, the UNDP will limit its involvement to the facilitation of the „stakeholders engagement meetings" targeted to defining the priorities of the new AC strategy and to conducting a needs assessment exercise with a comparative analysis approach.

project_descr: UNDP Romania Country Office - Development Support Services
